selection.label: Selection tool
selection.defaultStatus: Click a word or use arrow keys to navigate.

arrow.label: Arrow tool
arrow.selectAnchor: Select words for the anchor, then press <kbd>Enter</kbd>.
arrow.selectTarget: Now select the target and press <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

highlight.label: Highlight tool
highlight.selectWords: Select words to highlight, then press <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

comments.label: Comments tool
comments.selectWords: Select words to comment on, then press <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

underline.label: Underline tool
underline.selectWords: Select words to underline, then press <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

eraser.label: Eraser tool
eraser.status: Click and drag to erase highlights and underlines.

lockHint: Press <kbd>Esc</kbd> <kbd>K</kbd> to lock the editor once you've finalised the contents.
